dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref. 3577
dmca.body:
en

 

-----Original Message-----
From: MSAntiPiracy02 [mailto:Internet2@microsoft-antipiracy.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 2004 10:33 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS
Ref. 35773

 

VIA EMAIL: 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity 

URL:  <http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5438>
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5438,
<http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4708>
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4708,
<http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4206>

<http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4046>

http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4029,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4025,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=3839,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5438,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5165,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5103,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4823,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4722,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=3963
<http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=3963&hit=1> &hit=1

CASE #: 35773 

16 November 2004 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies
of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted
computer programs published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works: 

Computer program(s): 
Xbox: Need For Speed Underground 
Encarta Encyclopedia Deluxe 2005 
Windows 2003 Server Datacenter 
Windows 2003 Server Standard 
Windows XP Professional 
Windows 2000 Server 
Windows 2000 Professional 
Windows Millenium 
Windows 98 
Windows 95 
Windows 2003 Server Standard 
Windows 2003 Server Web 
Windows XP Home Edition 
Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 
Windows XP Media Center Edition 
Windows 2000 Advanced Server 
Windows 2000 Data Center 
Windows NT Server 
Windows NT Workstation 
Windows NT Terminal Server 
Windows 98 Second Edition 
Windows NT 3.1 
Virtual PC 2004 
Xbox: Halo 2 
Xbox: Outlaw Golf 2 

Copyright owner(s): 
Microsoft Corporation 

2. Infringing material or activity found at the following location(s):
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5438,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4708,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4206,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4046,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4029,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4025,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=3839,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5438,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5165,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=5103,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4823,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=4722,
http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=3963
<http://www.pisexy.org/details.php?id=3963&hit=1> &hit=1

The above computer program(s) is being made available for copying, through
downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright
owner.

3. Statement of authority: 

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft,
the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good
faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been
authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this
software via your company's network. 

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
what actions you take. 

Yours sincerely, 

James Young 
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation 
One Microsoft Way 
Redmond, WA 98052 
United States of America 

E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com
